description: A hot-headed inspector takes on a small but powerful Vietnamese-Chinese gang after a series of crimes and murder attempts committed and putting an undercover cop and his girlfriend in great danger.
After trying to cover up a car accident that left a man dead, a crooked homicide detective is stalked by a mysterious man claiming to have witnessed the event.
A retired special agent forges an unlikely bond with his neglected young neighbor, and vows to bring the girl back home safely after she's kidnapped by violent criminals.
When a change of heart moves a well-trained hitman to tender his resignation to his employers, no good comes of it for anyone.
A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.
